title: The Magic touch
creator_credit: V. Shantaram, Films Division, Government of India and Mushir Ahmad
brief_description: A visual impression of Indian arts and crafts, recording the skill of the country’s artisans. Shows filigree from Cuttack and Hyderabad, the enamelled brassware of Moradabad, Jaipur and Lucknow, bronze figures from South India, ivory models wrought in Mysore and Travancore, the papiermache work from Kashmir.
